prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Piano, Brass, Guitar, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Drums, Piano, Brass, and Guitar, but no Bass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Drums, Piano, Brass, and Guitar, omitting Bass.

Style 3:
No Bass is included in this song, but it does have Drums, Piano, Brass, and Guitar.
